name: Hope On A Rope Shirt
description: This T-Shirt is an American Apparel TR401 Tri-Blend Short Sleeve Track Shirt MEN and WOMEN's Sizes in Tri Indigo Available in X-Small to X-Large Enjoy everything you love about the fit, feel and durability of a vintage T-shirt. -Tri-Blend (50% Polyester / 25% Cotton / 25% Rayon) construction -Polyester retains shape and elasticity; Cotton lends both comfort and durability; addition of Rayon makes for a unique texture and drapes against the body for a slimming look -Durable rib neckband Sizing

name: From The Vanishing Point Shirt
description: "From The Vanishing Point" album art Tee. Artwork by: Taverner Terry This T-Shirt is an Alternative Apparel Dean Slub Crew in White. name: RWB Blue Ohio Shirt
description: This T-Shirt is an American Apparel BB401 Poly-Cotton Short Sleeve Crew Neck UNISEX in Heather Blue Now Available in X-Small!! An ultra-soft, ultra-comfy unisex t-shirt that feels like you’ve owned it for years the moment you put it on, and for years to come. -Poly-Cotton (50% Polyester / 50% Cotton) construction -Baby Rib cotton stretchable collar for increased comfort and durability -Reinforced shoulder construction to maintain shape through repeated washings -Durable double-stitched bottom hem -Please note that our 50/50 Poly-Cotton Shirt fits slightly slimmer and longer than our 2001 Fine Jersey T-Shirt Sizing

name: Angel Stickers
description:
Two 4 inch square vinyl Red Wanting Blue angel stickers. One is red and the other is blue printed on white vinyl. These are great for applying to anything that gets exposed to the elements of weather.

Currently available Only in Orange

name: RWB Hologram Sticker *New!*
description: 3 inch x 9 inch holographic sticker.

name: Flag Decal/Sticker
description:
This sticker is die cut into the shape of the Ohio Flag. It meaasures approximately 6”Wx3.5”H. The area inside the black is the shape of the sticker.

Larger Photo

name: Angel Decal
description:
This is a a 4 inch by 4 inch Vinyl cut out RWB Angel decal/sticker in your choice of Black, White, Silver or Gold.

Only the image color shows on your surface, everything else has been trimmed away. These stickers are designed to be applied outdoors in the harshest conditions for 3+ years! Apply them to planes, trains and automobiles! They will stick to any smooth, relatively flat surface!

name: Warehouse Sessions DVD/CD (2006)
description:
Warehouse Sessions DVD/CD (2006)

Click the button above to order the physical CD and download the tracks immediately! That's right...get the music now while you wait for the physical package. What a deal...Check it out!

About:

The Warehouse Sessions project is a live concert recording that was filmed at our warehouse, the home of our creative process and rehearsal space for almost five years. One hundred fans joined us at the warehouse to record a live acoustic performance specifically geared towards releasing a live acoustic CD & DVD. We did some classic Red Wanting Blue acoustic show favorites as well many of the songs that will be on the bands upcoming record. – RWB

Reviews:

Its 5am, youre driving home through deserted city street in your parents car that you snuck out of the driveway. Youve been dancing all night and fallen in love at least three times. The sky to the east is just starting to turn from black to deep blue. You feel liberated, exhilarated, free. What are you listening to? Red Wanting Blue.- Performing Songwriter Magazine (June 05)
